# JSONSerialization

**Class**

An object that converts between JSON and the equivalent Foundation objects.

## Declaration

```swift
class JSONSerialization
```

## Overview

You use the [doc://com.apple.foundation/documentation/Foundation/JSONSerialization] class to convert JSON to Foundation objects and convert Foundation objects to JSON.

To convert a Foundation object to JSON, the object must have the following properties:

- The top level object is an [doc://com.apple.foundation/documentation/Foundation/NSArray] or [doc://com.apple.foundation/documentation/Foundation/NSDictionary], unless you set the [doc://com.apple.foundation/documentation/Foundation/JSONSerialization/WritingOptions/fragmentsAllowed] option.
- All objects are instances of [doc://com.apple.foundation/documentation/Foundation/NSString], [doc://com.apple.foundation/documentation/Foundation/NSNumber], [doc://com.apple.foundation/documentation/Foundation/NSArray], [doc://com.apple.foundation/documentation/Foundation/NSDictionary], or [doc://com.apple.foundation/documentation/Foundation/NSNull].
- All dictionary keys are instances of [doc://com.apple.foundation/documentation/Foundation/NSString].
- Numbers are neither `NaN` nor infinity.

Other rules may apply. Calling [doc://com.apple.foundation/documentation/Foundation/JSONSerialization/isValidJSONObject(_:)] or attempting a conversion are the definitive ways to tell if the [doc://com.apple.foundation/documentation/Foundation/JSONSerialization] class can convert given object to JSON data.



## Creating a JSON Object

- **jsonObject(with:options:)**: Returns a Foundation object from given JSON data.
- **jsonObject(with:options:)**: Returns a Foundation object from JSON data in a given stream.
- **JSONSerialization.ReadingOptions**: Options used when creating Foundation objects from JSON data.

## Creating JSON Data

- **data(withJSONObject:options:)**: Returns JSON data from a Foundation object.
- **writeJSONObject(_:to:options:error:)**: Writes a given JSON object to a stream.
- **JSONSerialization.WritingOptions**: Options for writing JSON data.
- **isValidJSONObject(_:)**: Returns a Boolean value that indicates whether the serializer can convert a given object to JSON data.

## JSON

- **JSONEncoder**: An object that encodes instances of a data type as JSON objects.
- **JSONDecoder**: An object that decodes instances of a data type from JSON objects.

## Inherits From

- NSObject

## Conforms To

- CVarArg
- CustomDebugStringConvertible
- CustomStringConvertible
- Equatable
- Hashable
- NSObjectProtocol
